ARABIC: وَيَسْتَنۢبِـُٔونَكَ أَحَقٌّ هُوَ قُلْ إِى وَرَبِّىٓ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقٌّ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will ask you to tell them if this is true. Say: 'Yes indeed, by my Lord, it certainly is true and you can do nothing to prevent it.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet they want to be informed if it is true. Say: "By my Lord, it is the truth. You cannot invalidate it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They ask you if what you say is true? Tell them: 'Yes, by my Lord, this is altogether true, and you have no power to prevent the chastisement from befalling.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They ask you, "Is that (punishment) true?" Tell them, "It certainly is. I swear by my Lord. You can not escape from (God's retribution)".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they ask you “Is it a reality*?” Say, “Yes, by oath of my Lord, indeed surely it is a reality, and you will not be able to escape.” (* The punishment of the hereafter.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they ask you to inform them (saying): "Is it true" Say: "Yes! By my Lord! It is the very truth! And you cannot escape it!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they ask you: Is that true? Say: Aye! by my Lord! it is most surely the truth, and you will not escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They ask thee to tell them, 'Is it true?' Say: 'Yes, by my Lord! It is true; you cannot frustrate Him.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they ask thee to inform them (saying): Is it true? Say: Yea, by my Lord, verily it is true, and ye cannot escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They enquire of you if this will really happen. Tell them, "Yes, by my Lord. Most certainly it will happen, and you cannot avert it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they ask thee to tell them if it be-true. Say thou: yeal by my Lord, It, Is the veary truth, and ye shall not be able to escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They inquire of you, ‘Is it true?’ Say, ‘Yes! By my Lord, it is true, and you cannot frustrate [Him].’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They seek to be informed by thee: "Is that true?" Say: "Aye! by my Lord! it is the very truth! and ye cannot frustrate it!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they ask you (O Muhammad SAW) to inform them (saying): "Is it true (i.e. the torment and the establishment of the Hour; - the Day of Resurrection)?" Say: "Yes! By my Lord! It is the very truth! and you cannot escape from it!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They ask you to tell them if it is true. Say: 'Yes, by my Lord! It is true, and you cannot frustrate it'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they inquire of you, “Is it true?” Say, “Yes, by my Lord, it is true, and you cannot evade it.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they ask information of you, [O Muhammad], "Is it true?" Say, "Yes, by my Lord. Indeed, it is truth; and you will not cause failure [to Allah]."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:53] And they ask you to tell, to inform, them, ‘Is it true?’, that which you promise us in the way of chastisement and resurrection? Say: ‘Aye, indeed, by my Lord! Verily it is true and you cannot escape’, [you cannot] elude   the chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they ask thee) O Muhammad (to inform them) i.e. about the punishment and the Qur'an ((saying): Is it true) i.e. the punishment and the Qur'an? (Say: Yea, by my Lord) say: yes, by my Lord, (verily it is true) the punishment will truly happen, (and ye cannot escape) Allah's punishment.
